array.string: #1 They once made a %1$@ toilet paper, but it wouldn't take shit from anybody.
#2 %1$@ can touch MC Hammer.
#3 It takes 14 puppeteers to make %1$@ smile, but only 2 to make him destroy an orphanage.
#4 James Cameron wanted %1$@ to play the Terminator. However, upon reflection, he realised that would have turned his movie into a documentary, so he went with Arnold Schwarzenegger.
#5 There are no weapons of mass destruction in Iraq, %1$@ lives in Oklahoma.
#6 %1$@ and Mr. T walked into a bar. The bar was instantly destroyed, as that level of awesome cannot be contained in one building.
#7 Wilt Chamberlain claims to have slept with more than 20,000 women in his lifetime. %1$@ calls this "a slow Tuesday."
#8 When %1$@ is in a crowded area, he doesn't walk around people. He walks through them.
#9 You know how they say if you die in your dream then you will die in real life? In actuality, if you dream of death then %1$@ will find you and kill you.
#10 The show Survivor had the original premise of putting people on an island with %1$@. There were no survivors, and nobody is brave enough to go to the island to retrieve the footage.
#11 %1$@ grinds his coffee with his teeth and boils the water with his own rage.
#12 In the beginning there was nothing...then %1$@ Roundhouse kicked that nothing in the face and said "Get a job". That is the story of the universe.
#13 On his birthday, %1$@ randomly selects one lucky child to be thrown into the sun.
#14 %1$@ once sued the Houghton-Mifflin textbook company when it became apparent that their account of the war of 1812 was plagiarized from his autobiography.
#15 A picture is worth a thousand words. A %1$@ is worth 1 billion words.
#16 If tapped, a %1$@ roundhouse kick could power the country of Australia for 44 minutes.
#17 %1$@ can divide by zero
#18 Life is not, in fact, like a box of chocolates. It is more like a box of %1$@, roundhouse kicking you in the face. And if you receive a box of %1$@, you ALWAYS know what you are going to get.
#19 When %1$@ has sex with a man, it won't be because he is gay. It will be because he has run out of women.
#20 Scientists have estimated that the energy given off during the Big Bang is roughly equal to 1NCRhK (%1$@ Roundhouse Kick)
#21 When %1$@ falls in water, %1$@ doesn't get wet. Water gets %1$@.
#22 Bill Gates lives in constant fear that %1$@' PC will crash.
#23 Don't even ask. %1$@ is always serious.
#24 Superman owns a pair of %1$@ pyjamas.
#25 When %1$@ went to donate sperm, half the nurses drowned; the rest were pregnant.
#26 The most honourable way of dying is taking a bullet for %1$@. This amuses %1$@ because he is bulletproof.
#27 %1$@ is the only person on the planet that can kick you in the back of the face.
#28 The phrase, "You are what you eat" cannot be true based on the amount of pussy %1$@ eats.
#29 %1$@ has to maintain a concealed weapon license in all 50 states in order to legally wear pants.
#30 Facebook was created for counting how many people left to be roundhouse kicked.
#31 When an episode of Walker Texas Ranger was aired in France, the French surrendered to %1$@ just to be on the safe side.
#32 When you're %1$@, anything + anything is equal to 1.... 1 roundhouse kick to the face..
#33 %1$@ does not sleep. He waits.
#34 %1$@ can touch MC Hammer
#35 %1$@ was once the F.B.I's chief negotiator. His job involved calling up criminals and saying, "This is %1$@."
#36 %1$@ can satisfy a woman by pointing at her with his finger and saying "Booya"
#37 The reason newborn babies cry is because they know they have just entered a world with %1$@.
#38 %1$@ did that to Michael Jackson's face.
#39 The saddest moment for a child is not when he learns Santa Claus isn't real, it's when he learns %1$@ is.
#40 Along with his black belt, %1$@ often chooses to wear brown shoes. No one has DARED call him on it. Ever.
#41 The grass is always greener on the other side, unless %1$@ has been there. In that case the grass is most likely soaked in blood and tears.
#42 After much debate, President Truman decided to drop the atomic bomb on Hiroshima rather than the alternative of sending %1$@. It was more "humane".
#43 %1$@ once walked down the street with a massive erection. There we no survivors.
#44 Scientists in Washington have recently conceded that, if there were a nuclear war, all that would remain are cockroaches and %1$@.
#45 %1$@ isn’t lactose intolerant. He just doesn’t put up with lactose’s shit.
#46 In the original pilot for Star Trek Next Generation, %1$@ can be seen powering the USS Enterprise warp drive with his roundhouse kicks.

#47 Contrary to popular belief, %1$@, not the box jellyfish of northern Australia, is the most venomous creature on earth. Within 3 minutes of being bitten, a human being experiences the following symptoms: fever, blurred vision, beard rash, tightness of the jeans, and the feeling of being repeatedly kicked through a car windshield.

#48 %1$@ went looking for a bar but couldn’t find one. He walked to a vacant lot and sat there. Sure enough within an hour an a half someone constructed a bar around him. He then ordered a shot, drank it, and then burned the place to the ground. %1$@ yelled over the roar of the flames, “always leave things the way you found em!”
#49 If %1$@ wants your opinion, he'll beat it into you.
#50 Some people wear Superman pyjamas. Superman wears %1$@ pyjamas.
#51 %1$@ lost his virginity before his dad did.
#52 %1$@ doesn't use pickup lines, he simply says, "Now."
#53 %1$@ invented black. In fact, he invented the entire spectrum of visible light. Except pink. Tom Cruise invented pink.
#54 %1$@ can piss into gale force winds.
#55 When you open a can of whoop-ass, %1$@ jumps out.
#56 %1$@ doesn’t need to swallow when eating food.
#57 %1$@ has never blinked in his entire life. Never.
#58 %1$@’ roundhouse kick is so powerful, it can be seen from outer space by the naked eye.
#59 %1$@ drinks napalm to quell his heartburn.
#60 If paper beats rock, rock beats scissors, and scissors beats paper, what beats all 3 at the same time? Answer: %1$@.
#61 %1$@ used live ammunition during all shoot-outs. When a director once said he couldn’t, he replied, “Of course I can, I’m %1$@,” and roundhouse kicked him in the face.
#62 %1$@ doesn't worry about changing his clock twice a year for daylight savings time. The sun rises and sets when he tells it to.
#63 %1$@ does not procreate, he breeds
#64 If %1$@ is late, time better slow the fuck down
#65 %1$@ can judge a book by its cover.
#66 %1$@ is the only man to ever defeat a brick wall in a game of tennis.
#67 %1$@ doesn't have AIDS but he gives it to people anyway.
#68 %1$@ is Luke Skywalker’s real father.
#69 %1$@ only masturbates to pictures of %1$@.
#70 There is no such thing as tornados. %1$@ just hates trailer parks.
#71 %1$@ frequently donates blood to the Red Cross. Just never his own.
#72 Once a grizzly bear threatened to eat %1$@. He showed the bear his fist and the bear proceeded to eat himself, because it would be the less painful way to die.
#73 %1$@ once broke the land speed record on a bicycle that was missing its chain and the back tire.
#74 When %1$@ had surgery, the anaesthesia was applied to the doctors.
#75 %1$@ once ate an entire ream of rice paper and shat out origami swans and Mister Miyagi from Karate Kid.

#76 In fine print on the last page of the Guinness Book of World Records it notes that all world records are held by %1$@, and those listed in the book are simply the closest anyone else has ever gotten.
#77 When the Boogeyman goes to sleep every night he checks his closet for %1$@.
#78 %1$@ does not hunt because the word hunting infers the probability of failure. %1$@ goes killing.
#79 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles is based on a true story: %1$@ once swallowed a turtle whole, and when he crapped it out, the turtle was six feet tall and had learned karate.
#80 %1$@ doesn't step on toes. %1$@ steps on necks.
#81 %1$@ can lead a horse to water AND make it drink.
#82 There is no chin behind %1$@’ beard. There is only another fist.
#83 Pee Wee Herman got arrested for masturbating in public. The same day, %1$@ got an award for masturbating in public.
#84 If you have five dollars and %1$@ has five dollars, %1$@ has more money than you.
#85 %1$@' iPod came with a real charger instead of just a USB cord
#86 %1$@ kicked Neo out of Zion , now Neo is "The Two"
#87 %1$@ is currently suing NBC, claiming Law and Order are trademarked names for his left and right legs.
#88 When %1$@ sends in his taxes, he sends blank forms and includes only a picture of himself, crouched and ready to attack. %1$@ has not had to pay taxes, ever.
#89 %1$@ is the only person who can simultaneously hold and fire FIVE Uzis: One in each hand, one in each foot ‚Äì and the 5th one he roundhouse-kicks into the air, so that it sprays bullets.
#90 The Drummer for Def Leppard's only got one arm. %1$@ needed a back scratcher.
#91 As President Roosevelt said: “We have nothing to fear but fear itself. And %1$@.”
#92 %1$@ uses a night light. Not because %1$@ is afraid of the dark, but the dark is afraid of %1$@.
#93 %1$@ once ate a whole cake before his friends could tell him there was a stripper in it.
#94 In an average living room there are 1,242 objects %1$@ could use to kill you, including the room itself.
#95 To be or not to be? That is the question. The answer? %1$@.
#96 %1$@’ house has no doors, only walls that he walks through.
#97 %1$@ sleeps with a pillow under his gun.
#98 %1$@ has a deep and abiding respect for human life... unless it gets in his way.

#99 A blind man once stepped on %1$@' shoe. he replied, "Don't you know who I am? I'm %1$@!" The mere mention of his name cured this man blindness. Sadly the first, last, and only thing this man ever saw, was a fatal roundhouse delivered by %1$@.
#100 %1$@ has already been to Mars; that's why there are no signs of life there.
#101 It takes %1$@ 20 minutes to watch 60 Minutes.
#102 %1$@ roundhouse kicks people in the face first and asks questions later.
#103 For some, the left testicle is larger than the right one. For %1$@, each testicle is larger than the other one.
#104 %1$@ once ordered a steak in a restaurant. The steak did what it was told.
#105 The grass is always greener on the other side, unless %1$@ has been there. In that case the grass is most likely soaked in blood and tears.
#106 %1$@ is the only person in the world that can actually email a roundhouse kick.
#107 %1$@ once round-house kicked a salesman. Over the phone.
#108 %1$@ shot the sheriff, but he round house kicked the deputy.
#109 %1$@ once lost the remote, but maintained control of the TV by yelling at it in between bites of his “Filet of Child” sandwich.
#110 Little known medical fact: %1$@ invented the Caesarean section when he roundhouse-kicked his way out of his mother's womb.
#111 There are now five cup sizes at Starbucks: Short, Tall, Grande, Venti, and %1$@.
#112 That's not %1$@ doing push-ups - that's %1$@ moving the Earth away from the path of a deadly asteroid.
#113 %1$@ doesn't play god. Playing is for children.
#114 %1$@ cannot love, he can only not kill.
#115 When Bruce Banner gets mad, he turns into the Hulk. When the Hulk gets mad, he turns into %1$@.
#116 %1$@ once rode a nine foot grizzly bear through an automatic car wash, instead of taking a shower.
#117 %1$@ does not own a stove, oven, or microwave , because revenge is a dish best served cold.
#118 %1$@ was once in a knife fight, and the knife lost.
#119 If you Google search “%1$@ getting his ass kicked” you will generate zero results. It just doesn't happen.
#120 Behind every successful man, there is a woman. Behind every dead man, there is %1$@.
#121 %1$@ doesn't kill two birds with one stone. %1$@ kills all birds, with two stones.
#122 Someone once tried to tell %1$@ that roundhouse kicks aren't the best way to kick someone. This has been recorded by historians as the worst mistake anyone has ever made.
#123 The chemical formula for the highly toxic cyanide ion is CN-. These are also %1$@' initials. This is not a coincidence.
#124 %1$@ can kick through all 6 degrees of separation, hitting anyone, anywhere, in the face, at any time.
#125 Not everyone that %1$@ is mad at gets killed. Some get away. They are called astronauts.
#126 A %1$@-delivered Roundhouse Kick is the preferred method of execution in 16 states.
#127 The quickest way to a man's heart is with %1$@' fist.

#128 %1$@ is expected to win gold in every swimming competition at the 2008 Beijing Olympics, even though %1$@ does not swim. This is because when %1$@ enters the water, the water gets out of his way and %1$@ simply walks across the pool floor.
#129 %1$@ ordered a Big Mac at Burger King, and got one.
#130 Rules of fighting: 1) Don't bring a knife to a gun fight. 2) Don't bring a gun to a %1$@ fight.
#131 If at first you don't succeed, you're not %1$@.
#132 %1$@ can win a game of Connect Four in only three moves.
#133 Mr. T pities the fool. %1$@ rips the fool's head off.
#134 There is no theory of evolution. Just a list of creatures %1$@ has allowed to live.
#135 %1$@ knows the last digit of pi.
#136 The last thing you hear before %1$@ gives you a roundhouse kick? No one knows because dead men tell no tales.
#137 %1$@ doesn't shave, he kicks himself in the face. The only thing that can cut %1$@ is %1$@.
#138 When in a bar, you can order a drink called a “%1$@”. It is also known as a “Bloody Mary”, if your name happens to be Mary.
#139 Contrary to popular belief, there is indeed enough %1$@ to go around.
#140 %1$@ once shot down a German fighter plane with his finger, by yelling, “Bang!”
#141 There’s an order to the universe: space, time, %1$@‚Ä¶ Just kidding, %1$@ is first.
#142 %1$@ can taste lies.
#143 %1$@ uses pepper spray to spice up his steaks.
#144 If %1$@ were a calendar, every month would be named Guytober, and every day he'd kick your ass.
#145 %1$@ can sneeze with his eyes open.
#146 %1$@'s show is called Walker: Texas Ranger, because %1$@ doesn't run.
#147 If you ask %1$@ what time it is, he always says, “Two seconds 'til.” After you ask, “Two seconds 'til what?” he roundhouse kicks you in the face.
#148 %1$@ crossed the road. No one has ever dared question his motives.
#149 %1$@' first job was as a paperboy. There were no survivors.
#150 When %1$@ wants an egg, he cracks open a chicken.
#151 %1$@ is currently suing NBC, claiming Law and Order are trademarked names for his left and right legs.
#152 Archeologists unearthed an old english dictionary dating back to the year 1236. It defined “victim” as “one who has encountered %1$@”
#153 %1$@ does not get frostbite. %1$@ bites frost.
#154 In honor of %1$@, all McDonald's in Texas have an even larger size than the super-size. When ordering, just ask to be Guy-sized.
#155 Aliens DO indeed exist. They just know better than to visit a planet that %1$@ is on.
#156 %1$@ can skeletize a cow in two minutes.
#157 %1$@ describes human beings as “a sociable holder for blood and guts”.
#158 %1$@ likes his coffee half and half: half coffee grounds, half wood-grain alcohol.
#159 Ninjas want to grow up to be just like %1$@. But usually they grow up just to be killed by %1$@.
#160 %1$@ has to use a stunt double when he does crying scenes.
#161 %1$@ does not sleep. He waits.
#162 %1$@ CAN believe it's not butter.
#163 Everybody loves Raymond. Except %1$@.
#164 %1$@ played Russian Roulette with a fully loaded gun and won.
#165 During the Vietnam War, %1$@ allowed himself to be captured. For torture, they made him eat his own entrails. He asked for seconds.
#166 With the rising cost of gasoline, %1$@ is beginning to worry about his drinking habit.
#167 Time waits for no man. Unless that man is %1$@.
#168 There is no theory of evolution. Just a list of animals %1$@ allows to live.
#169 As an infant, %1$@' parents gave him a toy hammer. He gave the world Stonehenge.
#170 In an act of great philanthropy, %1$@ made a generous donation to the American Cancer Society. He donated 6,000 dead bodies for scientific research.
#171 %1$@ can win a game of Trivial Pursuit with one roll of the dice, and without answering a single question... just a nod of the head, and a stroke of the beard.
#172 %1$@ is the only man who has, literally, beaten the odds. With his fists.
#173 There is endless debate about the existence of the human soul. Well it does exist, and %1$@ finds it delicious.
#174 %1$@ is a vegetarian. Meaning, he does not eat animals until first he puts them into vegetative state with his fists.
#175 We live in an expanding universe. All of it is trying to get away from %1$@.
#176 %1$@ once shat blood - the blood of 11,940 natives he had killed and eaten.
#177 %1$@' calendar goes straight from March 31st to April 2nd; no one fools %1$@.
#178 So next time %1$@ is kicking your ass, don't be offended or hurt, he may be just trying to tell you he likes your hat.
#179 %1$@ uses 8'x10' sheets of plywood as toilet paper.
#180 %1$@ knows everything there is to know - Except for the definition of mercy.
#181 %1$@ once worked as a weatherman for the San Diego evening news. Every night he would make the same forecast: Partly cloudy with a 75%% chance of Pain.
#182 Google won't search for %1$@ because it knows you don't find %1$@, he finds you.
#183 When Arnold says the line “I'll be back” in the first Terminator movie it is implied that he is going to ask %1$@ for help.
#184 Nothing can escape the gravity of a black hole, except for %1$@. %1$@ eats black holes. They taste like chicken.
#185 %1$@ did in fact, build Rome in a day.
#186 It takes 14 puppeteers to make %1$@ smile, but only 2 to make him destroy an orphanage.
#187 A man once asked %1$@ if his real name is “Charles”. %1$@ did not respond, he simply stared at him until he exploded.
#188 In a fight between Batman and Darth Vader, the winner would be %1$@.
#189 %1$@ never goes to the dentist because his teeth are unbreakable. His enemies never go to the dentist because they have no teeth.
#190 %1$@ originally wrote the first dictionary. The definition for each word is as follows - A swift roundhouse kick to the face.
#191 Scotty in Star Trek often says “Ye cannae change the laws of physics.” This is untrue. %1$@ can change the laws of physics. With his fists.
#192 There are only two things that can cut diamonds: other diamonds, and %1$@.
#193 %1$@' tears cure cancer. Too bad he has never cried.
#194 When %1$@ was born, the only person who cried was the doctor. Never slap %1$@.
#195 The square root of %1$@ is pain. Do not try to square %1$@, the result is death.
#196 %1$@ likes his ice like he likes his skulls: crushed.
#197 “Let the Bodies Hit the Floor” was originally written as %1$@' theme song.
#198 There is in fact an “I” in Norris, but there is no “team”‚Ä¶ not even close.
#199 Divide %1$@ by zero and you will in fact get one‚Ä¶ one bad-ass that is.
#200 %1$@ invented a language that incorporates karate and roundhouse kicks.
#201 When you say “no one's perfect”, %1$@ takes this as a personal insult.
#202 In the Words of Julius Caesar, “Veni, Vidi, Vici, %1$@”. Translation: I came, I saw, and I was roundhouse-kicked in the face by %1$@.
#203 Do you know why Baskin Robbins only has 31 flavours? Because %1$@ doesn't like Fudge Ripple.
#204 The truth will set you free. Unless %1$@ has you, in which case, forget it buddy!
#205 Whoever said “only the good die young” was probably in %1$@'s kindergarten class.

#206 Jack Bauer tried to use his detailed knowledge of torture techniques, but to no avail: %1$@ thrives on pain. %1$@ then ripped off Jack Bauer's arm and beat him to death with it. Game, set, match.
#207 %1$@ wipes his ass with chain mail and sandpaper.
#208 Most boots are made for walkin'. %1$@' boots ain't that merciful.
#209 %1$@ counted to infinity - twice.
#210 %1$@ once won a game of Connect Four in 3 moves.
#211 When %1$@ says “More cowbell”, he MEANS it.
#212 %1$@ and Mr. T walked into a bar. The bar was instantly destroyed, as that level of awesome cannot be contained in one building.
#213 If you spell %1$@ in Scrabble, you win. Forever.
#214 %1$@ will never have a heart attack. His heart isn't nearly foolish enough to attack him.
#215 %1$@ is not hung like a horse... horses are hung like %1$@.
#216 Superman once watched an episode of Walker, Texas Ranger. He then cried himself to sleep.
#217 What was going through the minds of all of %1$@' victims before they died? His shoe.
#218 James Cameron wanted %1$@ to play the Terminator. However, upon reflection, he realized that would have turned his movie into a documentary, so he went with Arnold Schwarzenegger.
#219 A man once taunted %1$@ with a bag of Lay's potato chips, saying “Betcha can't eat just one!” %1$@ proceeded to eat the chips, the bag, and the man‚ in one deft move.
#220 According to Einstein's theory of relativity, %1$@ can actually roundhouse kick you yesterday.
#221 Tom Clancy has to pay royalties to %1$@ because “The Sum of All Fears” is the name of %1$@' autobiography.
#222 %1$@ doesn't own a can opener, he just chews through the can.
#223 In the first Jurassic Park movie, the Tyrannosaurus Rex wasn't chasing the jeep. %1$@ was chasing the Tyrannosaurus AND the jeep.

#224 %1$@ once bet NASA he could survive re-entry without a spacesuit. On July 19th, 1999, a naked %1$@ re-entered the earth's atmosphere, streaking over 14 states and reaching a temperature of 3000 degrees. An embarrassed NASA publicly claimed it was a meteor, and still owes him a beer.
#225 %1$@ doesn't cheat death. He wins fair and square.
#226 Some kids piss their name in the snow. %1$@ can piss his name into concrete.
#227 If you rearrange the letters in “%1$@”, they also spell “Crush Rock In”. The words “with his fists” are understood.
#228 Most people fear the Reaper. %1$@ considers him “a promising Rookie”.
#229 Those aren't credits that roll after Walker Texas Ranger. It is actually a list of fatalities that occurred during the making of the episode.
#230 Every time someone uses the word “intense”, %1$@ always replies “you know what else is intense?” followed by a roundhouse kick to the face.
#231 The chief export of %1$@ is Pain.
#232 There are two types of people in the world... people that suck, and %1$@.
#233 When %1$@ was a baby, he didn't suck his mother's breast. His mother served him whiskey, straight out of the bottle.
#234 When you're %1$@, anything + anything is equal to 1. One roundhouse kick to the face.
#235 182,000 Americans die from %1$@-related accidents every year.
#236 %1$@ once roundhouse kicked someone so hard that his foot broke the speed of light, went back in time, and killed Amelia Earhart while she was flying over the Pacific Ocean.
#237 %1$@ doesn't chew gum. %1$@ chews tin foil.
#238 In the medical community, death is referred to as “%1$@ Disease”.
#239 Everything King Midas touches turns to gold. Everything %1$@ touches turns up dead.
#240 For most people, home is where the heart is. For %1$@, home is where he stores his collection of human skulls.
#241 Leading hand sanitizers claim they can kill 99.9 percent of germs. %1$@ can kill 100 percent of whatever the fuck he wants.
#242 %1$@ always knows the EXACT location of Carmen SanDiego.
#243 "Brokeback Mountain" is not just a movie. It's also what %1$@ calls the pile of dead ninjas in his front yard.
#244 %1$@' favorite cereal is Kellogg's Nails 'N' Gravel.
#245 %1$@ got a perfect score on his SAT's, simply by writing %1$@ for every answer.
#246 %1$@ doesn't read books. He stares them down until he gets the information he wants.
#247 Paper beats rock, rock beats scissors, and scissors beats paper, but %1$@ beats all 3 at the same time.
#248 %1$@ never wet his bed as a child. The bed wet itself out of fear.
#249 If you work in an office with %1$@, don't ask him for his three-hole-punch.
#250 Police label anyone attacking %1$@ as a Code 45-11.... a suicide.
#251 He who lives by the sword, dies by the sword. He who lives by %1$@, dies by the roundhouse kick.
#252 %1$@ CAN in fact "raise the roof". And he can do it with one hand.
#253 %1$@ eats steak for every single meal. Most times he forgets to kill the cow.
#254 %1$@ can win at solitaire with only 18 cards.
#255 Outer space exists because it's afraid to be on the same planet with %1$@.
#256 %1$@ got his drivers license at the age of 16. Seconds.
#257 %1$@ can delete the Recycling Bin."

#258 %1$@ owns the greatest Poker Face of all-time. It helped him win the 1983 World Series of Poker despite him holding just a Joker, a Get out of Jail Free Monopoly card, a 2 of clubs, 7 of spades and a green #4 card from the game Uno.
#259 %1$@ puts the "laughter" in "manslaughter".
#260 %1$@ once visited the Virgin Islands. They are now The Islands.
#261 The air around %1$@ is always a balmy 78 degrees.
#262 If you're driving down the road and you think %1$@ just cut you off, you better thank your lucky stars it wasn't the other way around.
#263 If a tree falls in the forest, does anybody hear? Yes. %1$@ hears it. %1$@ can hear everything. %1$@ can hear the shrieking terror in your soul.
#264 When %1$@ was denied an Egg McMuffin at McDonald's because it was 10:35, he roundhouse kicked the store so hard it became a Wendy's.
#265 Once, while having sex in a tractor-trailer, part of %1$@' sperm escaped and got into the engine. We now know this truck as Optimus Prime.
